vsParam:
Oh, you've piled all the ingredients up!
They're enough to fix my work!

I'll start to fix it. Just watch.
Understood?

It's said mechanics in Ateria is very developed,
but I've never seen anyone fixing a machine like that...

It's going to be an era of machines, which will
make anything easier and faster, especially manual labor.

As for wizardry and alchemy...
Machines might replace them someday.

Well... Um... Who knows...
It may be a possibility...
Even so, I'll try my best to learn alchemy!
Maybe I should change my class...

Yeah, good for you, [px]!
Please keep trying as an alchemist!

Ah, don't go adrift!
You can't be seized by a whim, [px]!
[px], keep trying as an alchemist! OK!?

OK, it's fixed!
How about that? This is my best masterpiece!

Um...
Excuse me, but what does this machine do?

Hee hee, you just need to press here...
And it will run!

Yeah, that's it!
What? Impressive, huh? Isn't it?
... By the way, it starts to smoke, doesn't it matter?

Ahhh!? Darn, don't do this to me again!
Stop it! Hey, stop it!

Well.
Maybe the era of machines will come someday...

But it's still got a long way to go.
Hahahaha!
